title: Banana Ice Nicotine Pouches By Killa
description: TRY KILLA BANANA ICE NICOTINE POUCHES Banana Ice Nicotine Pouches by Killa offer the delightful taste of ripe bananas, known for their thick, pebbled skin and irresistibly sweet, soft flesh. This flavor embodies the excellence you'd anticipate from a brand like Killa! View all Killa Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Medium Pouches View all Sweets & Treats Pouches KEY FEATURES: Banana flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users 16mg Per Gram | 12.8mg Per Pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT BANANA FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Killa Exclusive Banana Ice delivers a tropical and revitalizing experience, featuring the familiar taste of bananas transformed into an exhilaratingly icy sensation. Packed with a potent dose of nicotine, it stands as one of the boldest pouch options available. MORE ABOUT KILLA NICOTINE POUCHES In the realm of nicotine pouches, Killa is a well-known brand that provides a variety of smokeless and tobacco-free nicotine products. Here is a description of the Killa company. Killa nicotine pouches are available in a number of flavours to suit different palates. Mint, citrus, berries, and other flavours with a fruity influence are some of the most popular flavours. Users can select pouches that suit their tastes thanks to the varied flavour range. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Killa Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Large Our Strength Rating: Strong Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch) 16 MG Flavour Name: Banana Ice Flavour: Fruity Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
